row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ---------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_AUTHINFO
:IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! BUILDING EXECUTION COMMAND : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGOUT_CLA# = "cf logout "
! LOGGING CF COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CF LOGOUT COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_LOGOUT_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF LOGOUT COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_LOGOUT_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING CF COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_CF_LOGOUT_CLA# :ENDIF
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LOGOUT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LOGOUT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
!------------------------------------------ IN CASE OF SUCCESS REMOVE AUTH_TOKEN FROM VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : DELETE_VAR "PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.VARA.AUTHINFO", "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : PRINT "AUTH_TOKEN removed from VARA successfully!" :ENDIF
